description: Replace greedy schedule algorithm with a proper constraint satisfaction solver (backtracking CSP) to guarantee 100% valid NFL schedules with all 272 games placed
goal: Guarantee all 272 games are placed every time with fast performance (under 5 seconds)
requirements: All 272 games placed - every team gets exactly 17 games
Proper bye week distribution - each team has 1 bye in weeks 5-14
Division games correct - 6 division games per team (2 vs each rival)
No duplicate matchups - teams play each other max 2 times
Pure TypeScript implementation - no external solver dependencies
Fast execution - schedule generation under 5 seconds
out_of_scope: TV slot optimization and primetime game assignment
Competitive balance and strength of schedule optimization
Stadium conflicts and shared venue scheduling
constraints: Pure TypeScript - no WASM or external binaries
Fallback to current greedy algorithm if solver times out
Must integrate with existing schedule-generator.ts structure
